name: @capgemini/generator-cdspackage
description: This Yeoman generator scaffolds Power Apps projects.

scripts.build: tsc && xcopy "src\generators\app\definitions" "generators\app\definitions" /I /y && xcopy "src\generators\app\templates" "generators\app\templates" /I /S /y && xcopy "src\generators\solution\templates" "generators\solution\templates" /I /S /y && xcopy "src\generators\pluginassembly\templates" "generators\pluginassembly\templates" /I /S /y && xcopy "src\generators\scripts\templates" "generators\scripts\templates" /I /S /y && xcopy "src\generators\data\templates" "generators\data\templates" /I /S /y
scripts.clean-debug: del /S /q debug\* && FOR /D %p IN ("debug\*") DO rmdir "%p" /s /q
